project.description: The purpose of this job is to start a stand alone server instance on a particular machine. This job is meant to be started via a rest call with certain commandline arguments

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
############################################################################### # You might want or need to change these ############################################################################### LOGFILE="./log/$(date +%y%m%d_%H%M).log" MVN_CMD="mvn" #COMP_CMD="7za a -mx=9" COMP_EXT="7z" #COMP_CMD="tar -cjvf" #COMP_EXT="bz2" #COMP_CMD="zip -9" #COMP_EXT="9.zip" #COMP_CMD="zip" #COMP_EXT="zip" COMP_CMD="tar -czvf" COMP_EXT="tar.gz"
interfacePath="faces/serverInterface.jsp" propPath="faces/properties.jsp" pomPath="faces/pom.jsp" LOGFILE="./log/$(date +%y%m%d_%H%M).log"
############################################################################### # No need to change anything below this line ###############################################################################
function log () { if [ "$1" == 'nl' ]; then echo -e "\n$2" | tee -a $LOGFILE else echo "$1" | tee -a $LOGFILE fi }
function cleanup () { # TODO Enable below #log nl "Cleaning up" #rm -fr ./log/init* #rm -fr ./log/powertac* #rm -fr ./game* #rm -f ./pom.xml #rm -f ./properties
log nl "Not cleaning up, need to enable this" }
function handle_states () { LOGGEDIN="server.CompetitionControlService: first login observed" FILE="./log/powertac-sim-$gameId.trace"
# Wait for the game to get ready sleep 30
log nl "Notify TM we're game_ready" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=game_ready"
while [ 1==1 ]; do COUNT=0 if [ -f $FILE ]; then COUNT=$(grep -c "$LOGGEDIN" "$FILE") fi
if [ $COUNT -gt 0 ]; then log "$COUNT > 0, breaking" break fi
sleep 1 done
log nl "Notify TM we're game_in_progress" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=game_in_progress" }
# Some intermediate variables interfaceUrl="$tourneyUrl$interfacePath" bootUrl="$interfaceUrl?action=boot&gameId=$gameId" propUrl="$tourneyUrl$propPath?gameId=$gameId" pomUrl="$tourneyUrl$pomPath?pomId=$pomId" bootName="game-$gameId-boot" simName="game-$gameId-sim"
log "Nodename : $NODE_NAME" log "Account : ${USER}" log "Machine : $machine" log "GameId : $gameId" log "PomId : $pomId" log "TourneyUrl : $tourneyUrl" log "Suffix : $suffix" log "Brokers : $brokers" log "MVN_CMD : $MVN_CMD" log "COMP_CMD : $COMP_CMD" log "COMP_EXT : $COMP_EXT" log "interfacePath : $interfacePath" log "propPath : $propPath" log "pomPath : $pomPath" log "interfaceUrl : $interfaceUrl" log "bootUrl : $bootUrl" log "propUrl : $propUrl" log "pomUrl : $pomUrl" log "bootName : $bootName" log "simName : $simName"
#log nl "These are the game properties" #wget -O properties $propUrl COUNT=$(grep -c 'server.weatherService.weatherLocation' properties) if [ $COUNT -le 0 ] ; then log nl "Error getting game properties : $propUrl" cleanup exit 1 else cat properties >> $LOGFILE fi
log nl "Getting pom file from $pomUrl" wget -O pom.xml $pomUrl log ""
if [ "$brokers" = "" ] ; then log nl "Running in bootstrap mode!"
log nl "Notify TM we're boot_in_progress" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=boot_in_progress"
CMD="$MVN_CMD -Pcli -Dexec.args=\"--boot $bootName.xml --config=$propUrl --log-suffix $suffix$gameId\"" log nl "Run maven : $CMD" eval $CMD
log nl "Bootstrap complete!"
if [ -e "$bootName.xml" ] ; then FILESIZE=$(stat -c%s "$bootName.xml") else FILESIZE=0 fi
if [ "$FILESIZE" -eq 0 ] ; then log nl "Notify TM we're boot_failed" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=boot_failed"
cleanup exit 1 else log nl "Compressing log files" $COMP_CMD "$bootName-logs.$COMP_EXT" log/powertac-$suffix$gameId.* log/init.*
log nl "Sending log file" curl --upload-file "$bootName-logs.$COMP_EXT" "$interfaceUrl?fileName=$bootName-logs.$COMP_EXT"
log nl "Sending boot file" curl --upload-file "$bootName.xml" "$interfaceUrl?fileName=$bootName.xml"
log nl "Notify TM we're boot_complete" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=boot_complete" fi else log "Running in sim mode!"
log nl "Brokers: $brokers"
log nl "Handle game states" handle_states &
CMD="mvn -Pcli -Dexec.args=\"-sim --boot-data=$bootUrl --config $propUrl --log-suffix $suffix$gameId --brokers $brokers --input-queue $serverQueue\"" log nl "Run maven : $CMD" eval $CMD
log nl "Compressing log files" $COMP_CMD "$simName-logs.$COMP_EXT" log/powertac-$suffix$gameId.* log/init.*
log nl "Sending log file" curl --upload-file "$simName-logs.$COMP_EXT" "$interfaceUrl?fileName=$simName-logs.$COMP_EXT"
log nl "Notify TM we're game_complete" wget --spider -q "$interfaceUrl?action=status&gameId=$gameId&status=game_complete" fi
cleanup exit 0
